```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
library(ggplot2)
```

load Helen's clean proportion data for triplicates 
```{r}
trip.prop <- read.csv('../data/PCR.proportions.clean.csv')

trip.prop.var <- trip.prop %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(mean = mean(c_across(PCR1_prop:PCR3_prop))) %>%
  mutate(sd = sd(c_across(PCR1_prop:PCR3_prop))) 

```

```{r}
hist(log(trip.prop.var$sd), breaks = 80)
```
